original_text: They might try to hide on the top of Mount Carmel. But I will find them and I will take them from there. They might try to hide from me deep down in the sea. But I will command the great sea snake to bite them.
korean_text: 갈멜 산 꼭대기에 숨을지라도 내가 거기에서 찾아낼 것이요 내 눈을 피하여 바다 밑에 숨을지라도 내가 거기에서 뱀을 명령하여 물게 할 것이요

sentences.original_text: They might try to hide on the top of Mount Carmel.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 갈멜산 꼭대기에 숨으려고 할지 모르지만

sentences.original_text: and I will take them from there.
They might try to hide from me deep down in the sea.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 나를 피해 바다 깊은 곳에 숨으려고 할지 모르지만

sentences.original_text: But I will command the great sea snake to bite them.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 큰 바다 뱀을 명령하여 그들을 물게 할 것이다
